channel.title: Creating a client
channel.description: How do you create a client that other people can download and use to connect to your server? I want something like the FinalBarrage client that ppl dwlload and then use it to connect to my server.

item.title: Creating a client
item.dc:creator: @jb_blaze jb blaze
item.description:
@jb_blaze wrote:

its in there, make sure you use the ctrl+f command, and type in the name of the server that it connects to, if you know it.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a client
item.dc:creator: @icevfire icevfire
item.description:
@icevfire wrote:

[quote=“Kalphiter, post:5, topic:243999”][quote author=legend-scape link=topic=320362.msg2536714#msg2536714 date=1226786060]

Ok, but how do I edit it so that it connects to my server, not the one that the download has?

ok, goto ur client files then u scroll down,
then u shud see client.java and search for the server ip e.g - 12365546566+5.no-ip.org change that to ur server ip name, + that was a fake server ip people,
[/quote]*search for the term: “no-ip”… that should work.[/quote]

I searched for ‘no-ip’ and .org, .com and everythin else but no luck hwo else would i find it or where would i put the ip?

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a client
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:4, topic:243999”][quote author=davidi2 link=topic=320362.msg2536643#msg2536643 date=1226784162]
Ok, but how do I edit it so that it connects to my server, not the one that the download has?
[/quote]

ok, goto ur client files then u scroll down,
then u shud see client.java and search for the server ip e.g - 12365546566+5.no-ip.org change that to ur server ip name, + that was a fake server ip people,[/quote]*search for the term: “no-ip”… that should work.

Read full topic
